00094 class CIccCurveSegment
00095 {
00096 public:
00097   virtual ~CIccCurveSegment() {}
00098 
00099   static CIccCurveSegment* Create(icCurveSegSignature sig, icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
00100   virtual CIccCurveSegment* NewCopy() const = 0;
00101 
00102   virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const = 0;
00103   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const = 0;
00104 
00105   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription)=0;
00106 
00107   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO)=0;
00108   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO)=0;
00109 
00110   virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg) = 0;
00111   virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const =0;
00112 
00113   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const = 0;
00114 
00115   icFloatNumber StartPoint() { return m_startPoint; }
00116   icFloatNumber EndPoint() { return m_endPoint;}
00117 
00118 protected:
00119   icFloatNumber m_startPoint;
00120   icFloatNumber m_endPoint;
00121   icUInt32Number m_nReserved;
00122 };

00132 class CIccFormulaCurveSegment : public CIccCurveSegment
00133 {
00134 public:
00135   CIccFormulaCurveSegment(icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
00136   CIccFormulaCurveSegment(const CIccFormulaCurveSegment &seg);
00137   CIccFormulaCurveSegment &operator=(const CIccFormulaCurveSegment &seg);
00138   virtual CIccCurveSegment *NewCopy() const { return new CIccFormulaCurveSegment(*this);}
00139   virtual ~CIccFormulaCurveSegment();
00140 
00141   virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const { return icSigFormulaCurveSeg; }
00142   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccFormulaCurveSegment"; }
00143 
00144   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00145 
00146   void SetFunction(icUInt16Number functionType, icUInt8Number num_parameters, icFloatNumber *parameters);
00147 
00148   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00149   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00150 
00151   virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg);
00152   virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const;
00153   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00154 
00155 protected:
00156   icUInt16Number m_nReserved2;
00157   icUInt8Number m_nParameters;
00158   icUInt16Number m_nFunctionType;
00159   icFloatNumber *m_params;
00160 };

00170 class CIccSampledCurveSegment : public CIccCurveSegment
00171 {
00172 public:
00173   CIccSampledCurveSegment(icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
00174   CIccSampledCurveSegment(const CIccSampledCurveSegment &ITPC);
00175   CIccSampledCurveSegment &operator=(const CIccSampledCurveSegment &ParamCurveTag);
00176   virtual CIccCurveSegment *NewCopy() const { return new CIccSampledCurveSegment(*this);}
00177   virtual ~CIccSampledCurveSegment();
00178 
00179   virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const { return icSigSampledCurveSeg; }
00180   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccSampledCurveSegment"; }
00181 
00182   virtual bool SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroAlloc=true); //nSize must be >= 2
00183   virtual icUInt32Number GetSize() { return m_nCount; }
00184 
00185   virtual icFloatNumber *GetSamples() { return m_pSamples; }
00186 
00187   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00188 
00189   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00190   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00191 
00192   virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg);
00193   virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const;
00194   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const ;
00195 
00196 protected:
00197   icUInt32Number m_nCount;   //number of samples used for interpolation
00198   icFloatNumber *m_pSamples; //interpolation values - Note m_pSamples[0] is initialized from previous segment in Begin()
00199 
00200   icFloatNumber m_range;
00201   icFloatNumber m_last;
00202 };

00283 class CIccMpeCurveSet : public CIccMultiProcessElement
00284 {
00285 public:
00286   CIccMpeCurveSet(int nSize=0);
00287   CIccMpeCurveSet(const CIccMpeCurveSet &curveSet);
00288   CIccMpeCurveSet &operator=(const CIccMpeCurveSet &curveSet);
00289   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const { return new CIccMpeCurveSet(*this);}
00290   virtual ~CIccMpeCurveSet();
00291 
00292   void SetSize(int nNewSize);
00293 
00294   bool SetCurve(int nIndex, icCurveSetCurvePtr newCurve);
00295 
00296   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigCurveSetElemType; }
00297   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeCurveSet"; }
00298 
00299   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00300 
00301   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00302   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00303 
00304   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
00305   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00306 
00307   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00308 
00309 protected:
00310   icCurveSetCurvePtr *m_curve;
00311 
00312   icPositionNumber *m_position;
00313 };

00331 class CIccMpeMatrix : public CIccMultiProcessElement
00332 {
00333 public:
00334   CIccMpeMatrix();
00335   CIccMpeMatrix(const CIccMpeMatrix &ITPC);
00336   CIccMpeMatrix &operator=(const CIccMpeMatrix &ParamCurveTag);
00337   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const { return new CIccMpeMatrix(*this);}
00338   virtual ~CIccMpeMatrix();
00339 
00340   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigMatrixElemType; }
00341   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeMatrix"; }
00342 
00343   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00344 
00345   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00346   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00347 
00348   void SetSize(icUInt16Number nInputChannels, icUInt16Number nOutputChannels);
00349 
00350   icFloatNumber *GetMatrix() {return m_pMatrix;}
00351   icFloatNumber *GetConstants() {return m_pConstants;}
00352 
00353   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
00354   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00355 
00356   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00357 
00358 protected:
00359   icFloatNumber *m_pMatrix;
00360   icFloatNumber *m_pConstants;
00361   icUInt32Number m_size;
00362   icMatrixElemType m_type;
00363 };

00381 class CIccMpeCLUT : public CIccMultiProcessElement
00382 {

00391   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeCLUT"; }

00394 
00395   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00396   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00397 
00398   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
00399   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00400 
00401   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00402
